ovdesc.p: This application is used to run the Cash Pooling on-line if the group permits. The user needs to enter the group name (id of AC.CP.GROUP.PARAM) or the sub-group name (also id of AC.CP.GROUP.PARAM).
All cash pool groups added in AC.CP.GROUP.PARAM except with Balance.to.use as "Value dated" is updated here.

To trigger sweep process automatically through phantom process, the sweep execution time can be specified here for the relevant group. By invoking the EB.PHANTOM with Run.Routine as "AC.AUTO.SWEEP.SELECT", all the cash pool records relevant for the Group with execution date as today will be invoked on the specified time.
When first time Eb.Phantom process is invoked, all the cash pool records with execution time Less than or Equal to the system time will be invoked.

desc.p: This has the latest time on which the phantom got executed for the time specified for this Group.
Note this field is updated only when the group has scheduled date as today and scheduled time less than or equal to system time.

t.desc:
Specify the time at which this group has to be executed automatically using phantom process.
All the cash pool records relevant to this Group id with scheduled execution date as today, will be executed at the time specified here.
To trigger above process, a record in EB.PHANTOM has to be added with Run.Routine as "AC.AUTO.SWEEP.SELECT" , which can be invoked either as Phantom or Interactive. This routine selects and triggers the cash pooling process for all the AC.CASH.POOL records which are scheduled for today with scheduled time less than system time.
Incase the INTRA.DAY is mentioned as SINGLE, then after the cash pool group is executed, the next execution date in AC.CASH.POOL moved as per the frequency given.
Incase the INTRA.DAY is mentioned as MULTIPLE, then after the cash pool execution, the next execution remains the same.
Input is in the hh:mm format where:
hh is the hour (in 24 hour format). Hours of 01 to 09 can also be entered as 1 to 9.
mm is the minutes past that hour.
The input of
: is optional.
The details given here is updated in AC.AUTO.SWEEP.SCHD application with id as the scheduled time along with the list of cash pool groups relevant for the scheduled time.
Please note incase the sweep time mentioned here is Less than the system time-then system will not execute it, unless and otherwise the phantom process is re-started again. Moreover whenever the phantom process is restarted, all the cash pool with scheduled time less than the system time and with scheduled execution date as of today is executed once again.
Validation Rules:
Optional Multi value field
Duplicate not allowed
Must be in standard time format.

desc.p: This has the user-id relevant to the phantom process.
The group.id (record id of AC.CP.GROUP.PARAM) of the sweep to be run.
Function allowed are "V"- to trigger intra day sweep online (Manually) and "I" - to input scheduled time for sweep to execute automatically.

Defines the charge that is to be collected for executing an intraday sweep.. Accepts valid record ID of FT.CHARGE.TYPE/FT.COMMISSION.TYPE. Care must be taken to define a fixed charge amount in FT.CHARGE.TYPE/FT.COMMISSION.TYPE. Otherwise, charge amount must be mandatorily input.
